title: Facebook : most popular game MAU 2019
summary: As of 2019 , the 2019 with the largest Monthly of Facebook and gas active in the game was the Texas_Holdem_Poker 2019 , with 10 different active .
The 2019 with the second largest Monthly of Facebook and gas active at that time was 8_Ball_Pool with just 10 active .
Due to new hydraulic fracturing ( fracking ) and drilling technology , the MAU can utilize more of its domestic Facebook resources and import less .
gold: This statistic lists the most popular Facebook games , based on monthly active users . As of August 2019 , Candy Crush Saga had approximately ten million monthly active users on Facebook . Fifth-ranked Subway Surfers had five million MAU in the same period .
